short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The universal wish-list maker. Add items to your gift list from any website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Free independent wish-list maker, add items to your wish-list from any stores as you browse online.

You can create new lists, and manage any existing lists directly.
